original_text: For to everyone who has will more be given, and he will have an abundance. But from the one who has not, even what he has will be taken away.
korean_text: 무릇 있는 자는 받아 풍족하게 되고 없는 자는 그 있는 것까지 빼앗기리라

sentences.original_text: For to everyone who has will more be given
sentences.korean_translation: 가진 모든 사람에게는 더 주어질 것이고

sentences.original_text: and he will have an abundance.
But from the one who has not,
even what he has will be taken away.
